properties.name: DOMAIN_NAME
properties.description: Name of the Windows domain (in FQDN format)

properties.name: DOMAIN_USER_NAME
properties.description: Username with permission to join computer to domain

properties.name: DOMAIN_USER_PASSWORD
properties.description: THIS IS A SENSITIVE FIELD. If left blank, you would be prompted for input during command execution. Password for the username with permission to join computer to domain

properties.name: DB_SERVER_OU_PATH
properties.description: Custom OU path for database server VMs

properties.name: CLUSTER_OU_PATH
properties.description: Custom OU path for server clusters

properties.name: SQL_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_PASSWORD
properties.description: THIS IS A SENSITIVE FIELD. If left blank, you would be prompted for input during command execution. Sql service account password

properties.name: ALLOW_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_OVERRRIDE
properties.description: Allow override of sql service account in provisioning workflows

properties.name: ERA_WORKER_SERVICE_PASSWORD
properties.description: THIS IS A SENSITIVE FIELD. If left blank, you would be prompted for input during command execution. Era worker service account password

properties.name: RESTART_SERVICE
properties.description: Restart sql service on the dbservers

properties.name: UPDATE_CREDENTIALS_IN_DBSERVERS
properties.description: Update the credentials in all the dbservers

properties.name: ALLOW_ERA_WORKER_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_OVERRIDE
properties.description: Allow override of era worker service account in provisioning workflows

properties.name: IS_GMSA_SQL_SERVICE_ACCOUNT
properties.description: The sqlservice startup account is a GMSA account.
